page.title: 19Gaelic in Tongue
page.content: O'chionn tri fichead bliahna bhiodh cloinn bruidhean ri cheile anns an canan Gaidhlig. Ach a nis dh'albh na laithen sin agus cha cluinn thu Gaidhlig air a bruidhean mach bho tearg do na seann sluagh. Tha Gaidlig air a theagaisg anns a sgoil aon uair's san seachuinn ach chaneil moran comas aig chloinn air bhroidhinn leis naceil Gaidlig aig na paranta. Ach tha choisir bhon sgoil dol gach bliadhna gus a mhoid agus gle thric faotinn duisean.Sixty years ago children would be speaking Gaelic to one another. Now these days are gone and one can only hear Gaelic spoken by a few old people. Gaelic is being taught in the schools once a week but children have no way of conversing in Gaelic since their parents don' speak it.Neverthe less choirs from the schools compete at the Provincial Mod and win prizes.
